subject: X Games
Accidents and Safety
Bicycles and Bicycling
Health Insurance and Managed Care
lead_paragraph: A serious  BMX accident left Stephen Murray paralyzed. His condition has caused other athletes to consider the life-altering consequences of what happens when things go wrong in action sports.
snippet: A serious  BMX accident left Stephen Murray paralyzed. His condition has caused other athletes to consider the life-altering consequences of what happens when things go wrong in action sports.
